snippet: “Traveling Lady,” at the French Institute Alliance Française’s Crossing the Line festival, is a fashion-driven multimedia concoction inspired by a journalist’s travels.
lead_paragraph: “Traveling Lady,” at the French Institute Alliance Française’s Crossing the Line festival, is a fashion-driven multimedia concoction inspired by a journalist’s travels.

headline.main: Exulting in Fashion, Unlike the Plucky Nellie Bly
headline.print_headline: Exulting in Fashion, Unlike the Plucky Nellie Bly
